com.itextpdf.io.font.constants

Class StandardFontFamilies

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.itextpdf.io.font.constants.StandardFontFamilies

  • public final class StandardFontFamilies
extends Object
    Class containing families for StandardFonts. This class was made for FontRegisterProvider.

      Font family for StandardFonts.ZAPFDINGBATS.
